data.text: Moyo wa mndewa wammakono ga Mndewa Imulungu,
Munhu kokona nzila zake zose zinoga mgameso gake,
Kusang'hana ganogile na ga haki,
Meso ga kibuli na zoyo da kuitapa,
Magesa ga munhu yoiyoha kusang'hana gogala ugoli mkulu,
Ugoli upatika kwa uvizi,
Usede wa wanhu wehile owabananga,
Nzila ya munhu yeli na kitala iha,
Vinoga kukala uchanha mumgwazo wa kiswili,
Choogesa munhu yehile kusang'hana gehile,
Munhu yeli na bezi yahakobozigwa, zozolo kopata ubala,
Imulungu mwene haki kogatanga gowosang'hana wehile mzing'anda zao,
Yosila magwiti ili sikuyahulike kililo cha mkiwa,
Ng'hasiliki yohozigwa na nhunza ya kinyelegezi,
Haki yahatendeka wanhu wanogile odeng'helela,
Munhu yokala kutali na nzila ya nzewele,
Yonogelwa kuhozoga kokuwa mkiwa,
Msang'hana gehile kopata kubulo jake na honda dimpate munhu mwene haki,
Vinoga kukala kuluwala,
Ukae kwa munhu yeli na ubala muna vinhu va bei ng'hulu,
Yozahila haki na kuwa na bazi,
Munhu yeli na ubala kovamila buga da wanhu wene nguvu,
Munhu youkimila mulomo wake na lulimi lwake,
Munhu yeli na bezi na kuitapa twaga jake, “Mkuduzi”
Kusulukila ng'hani kwa mnyeke kokuwa ifa yake,
Imisi ngima msang'hana gehile kosulukila kupata kinhu,
Nhosa ya msang'hana gehile, ngevuzo,
Msindila wa uvizi kobanangigwa,
Munhu yehile koilagusa kamba galu,
Haduhu ubala hebu nzewele hebu magesa ga wanhu,
Falasi kotandigwa goya mbuli ya siku ya ng'hondo,
